name: Water Bowl
description: Each time Kuzenbo takes over 2% of his maximum health worth of damage, pre-mitigation, he is granted a Stack of Damage Mitigation as his head fills with water (Max 10 Stacks). Stacks last 10s and refresh each time he gains another. If he is knocked up, grabbed, pulled, banished or otherwise disrupted, the bowl loses half of its stacks.
stats: Damage Mitigation: 1.5% per 2% of Maximum Health taken
